company_info.title: Company Information
company_info.name: Br√∫jula Cripto
company_info.description: Platform specialized in education, analysis and tools for cryptocurrencies.

purpose.title: Website Purpose
purpose.content: This platform provides educational content, market analysis, wallet recovery tools and premium services related to cryptocurrencies. All content is for informational and educational purposes only.

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: All content, designs, logos, texts, graphics, and source code are exclusive property of Br√∫jula Cripto or its licensors. Reproduction without express authorization is prohibited.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Use of our tools and content is at your own risk. We do not guarantee specific results nor are we responsible for financial losses derived from the use of our services.

applicable_law.title: Applicable Law
applicable_law.content: This legal notice is governed by Spanish and European legislation. Any dispute will be resolved in the competent courts of Spain.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.subtitle: We protect your privacy with advanced technical and organizational measures

data_collection.title: Data Collection
data_collection.content: We collect only data necessary to provide our services: email for authentication, user preferences and billing data for premium subscriptions.

data_usage.title: Data Usage
data_usage.content: Your data is used exclusively to: provide service access, process payments, send important updates and improve user experience.

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.content: We implement advanced technical and organizational security measures. Your data is protected through encryption, restricted access and regular security audits.

third_parties.title: Third Parties
third_parties.content: We use trusted services: Firebase (Google) for authentication and database, Stripe for payment processing. These providers comply with GDPR and international standards.

user_rights.title: Your Rights
user_rights.content: You have the right to: access your data, rectify it, delete it, portability and object to processing. Contact us to exercise these rights.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for functionality, theme preferences and authentication. We do not use advertising tracking cookies.

terms_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_conditions.subtitle: Terms of use for our educational services and tools

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using Br√∫jula Cripto, you fully accept these terms. If you disagree, do not use our services.

services.title: Service Description
services.content: We offer: free educational content, wallet recovery tools, market analysis, professional services directory and premium subscription with advanced features.

user_obligations.title: User Obligations
user_obligations.content: You commit to: use services legally, not share account credentials, provide truthful information and respect intellectual property.

prohibited_uses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited_uses.content: Prohibited: using services for illegal activities, attempting to breach security, distributing malware, reverse engineering or unauthorized commercial use.

subscription_terms.title: Subscription Terms
subscription_terms.content: Premium subscriptions auto-renew. You can cancel anytime. Refunds will be processed according to our 14-day refund policy.

limitation_liability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation_liability.content: Our maximum liability is limited to the value of your subscription. We are not responsible for indirect damages, data loss or lost profits.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms. Important modifications will be communicated 30 days in advance.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer

company_info.title: Company Information
company_info.content: Br√∫jula Cripto is a platform specialized in education, analysis and tools for cryptocurrencies. Contact: info@brujulacripto.com | Support: soporte@brujulacripto.com | Location: Alicante, Spain.

investment_warning.title: Critical Investment Warning
investment_warning.content: ‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL WARNING: Cryptocurrencies are extremely high-risk assets with unpredictable volatility. Prices can fluctuate dramatically in minutes. NEVER invest money you cannot afford to lose completely. Losses can exceed 100% of your initial investment.

educational_purpose.title: Strictly Educational Purpose
educational_purpose.content: ALL our content is exclusively educational and informational. It does NOT constitute financial, investment, legal or tax advice. We do NOT recommend buying, selling or holding specific cryptocurrencies. ALWAYS consult with qualified professional advisors before making financial decisions.

no_guarantees.title: Complete Absence of Guarantees
no_guarantees.content: Br√∫jula Cripto does NOT guarantee: (1) Absolute accuracy of market information, (2) Specific investment results, (3) Uninterrupted service operation, (4) Compatibility with all systems, (5) Success in asset recovery, (6) Prevention of financial losses.

tool_limitations.title: Critical Tool Limitations
tool_limitations.content: Our recovery tools have inherent technical limitations. Success depends on factors beyond our control: hardware condition, cryptographic complexity, elapsed time, and available data. We do NOT guarantee successful recovery. Use at your exclusive risk.

market_volatility.title: Extreme Market Volatility
market_volatility.content: Cryptocurrency markets exhibit extreme and unpredictable volatility. Fluctuations can be: (1) Greater than 50% in 24 hours, (2) Caused by news, regulations or manipulation, (3) Amplified by leverage to total losses, (4) Irreversible once executed.

regulatory_risks.title: Changing Regulatory Risks
regulatory_risks.content: Cryptocurrency regulations change constantly without prior notice. You MUST verify legality in your jurisdiction before using any crypto service. Some countries prohibit or restrict cryptocurrencies. Non-compliance may result in legal sanctions or total asset loss.

security_responsibility.title: Absolute Security Responsibility
security_responsibility.content: You are COMPLETELY responsible for: (1) Keeping your credentials and private keys secure, (2) Using two-factor authentication, (3) Verifying transaction addresses before sending, (4) Maintaining secure and updated backups, (5) Protecting your devices from malware.

liability_limitation.title: Strict Liability Limitation
liability_limitation.content: Under no circumstances will Br√∫jula Cripto be liable for: direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, business opportunities or reputation, even if advised of the possibility of such damages.

user_acknowledgment.title: User Acknowledgment
user_acknowledgment.content: By using our services, you acknowledge and agree that: (1) You have read and fully understood this disclaimer, (2) You assume all associated risks, (3) You will not hold Br√∫jula Cripto responsible for losses, (4) You act of your own free will and informed decision.

disclaimer.header_warning: IMPORTANT WARNING: Cryptocurrencies are high-risk assets. Read this entire disclaimer before using our services.

final_warning.title: FINAL REMINDER
final_warning.content: By using any Br√∫jula Cripto service, you expressly accept that you understand these risks and assume full responsibility. Never invest money you cannot afford to lose completely.

whatIsBrujula.question: What is Br√∫jula Cripto?
whatIsBrujula.answer: A platform for digital asset protection and recovery with specialized tools and security guides.

howToStart.question: How do I start using the platform?
howToStart.answer: You can begin with our free interactive diagnostic in the Recovery section to assess your specific situation.

passwordRecovery.question: How does password recovery work?
passwordRecovery.answer: Our tool uses advanced algorithms to test combinations based on the partial information you provide.

diagnosticWizard.question: What is the interactive diagnostic?
diagnosticWizard.answer: A system that guides you step by step to identify the best solution according to your specific access loss situation.

transactionTracker.question: How do I track a transaction?
transactionTracker.answer: Enter the transaction hash or address in our tracker to get detailed information about status and destination.

serviceDirectory.question: What is the service directory?
serviceDirectory.answer: A curated list of professional services specialized in cryptocurrency recovery and security.

securityGuides.question: Where do I find security guides?
securityGuides.answer: In our Blog section we have specialized articles on security and best practices to protect your assets.

latestNews.question: Do you publish updated news?
latestNews.answer: Yes, our blog is regularly updated with the latest news and trends from the crypto world.

registration.question: Do I need to register to use the tools?
registration.answer: Some basic tools are available without registration, but creating an account gives you access to additional functionalities.

usageCredits.question: How do time credits work?
usageCredits.answer: The system uses time-based credits (seconds) for advanced tools. You receive initial credits when you register.

supportEmail.question: How can I contact support?
supportEmail.answer: You can write to us at soporte@brujulacripto.com or use the contact form on this page.

responseTime.question: How long does it take to respond?
responseTime.answer: Our team typically responds within 24-48 hours during business days.

contactSupport.title: Didn't find what you were looking for?
contactSupport.description: Our support team is ready to help you with any specific questions.
